testcase.name: Email validator testing Validation asyncValidate Should return true for test@example.com
Email validator testing Validation asyncValidate Should return true for email@example.org
Email validator testing Validation asyncValidate Should return false for test@example.con
Email validator testing Validation asyncValidate Should return false for an empty string
testcase.classname: Should return false for an empty string

testcase.name: Email validator testing Validation with throw Should return true for test@example.com
Email validator testing Validation with throw Should return true for email@example.org
Email validator testing Validation with throw Should throw error for test@example.con
Email validator testing Validation with throw Should throw error for an empty string
testcase.classname: Should throw error for an empty string

testcase.name: Email validator testing Validation log Should return true for test@example.com
Email validator testing Validation log Should throw error for test@example.email
